blogPost.excerpt: Color Spark is a Figma plugin that allows designers to apply a colour scheme to their design prototypes in seconds. Focus on your design, make it stunning, and stop wasting time.
blogPost.body: Color Spark is a Figma plugin that allows designers to apply a colour scheme to their design prototypes in seconds. Focus on your design, make it stunning, and stop wasting time.
blogPost.title: Color Spark - A color scheme plugin for Figma
blogPost.author: bereket

localize.description: Color Spark是一款Figma插件，它允许设计师在几秒钟内将色彩方案应用到他们的设计原型中。专注于你的设计，让它惊艳，不再浪费时间。
Color Spark是一款Figma插件，它允許設計師在幾秒鐘內將色彩方案應用到他們的設計原型中。專注於你的設計，讓它驚豔，不再浪費時間。

previous.excerpt: Pocket self-care assistant that helps you stay positive and avoid negativity. JOI is a perfect tool for keeping a mood journal in a simple and funny way. Observe the correlation between your mood and activities during the day to see the patterns in your life.
previous.title: JOI: Mood Tracker & Self-care Journal - A pocket self-care assistant that makes you feel happier

localize.description: 袖珍自理助手，帮助你保持积极向上，避免消极情绪。JOI是一款以简单有趣的方式记录心情日记的完美工具。观察你的心情和一天中的活动之间的关联，看看你生活中的模式。
localize.tagline: 口袋里的自理助手，让你更快乐。

localize.description: 袖珍自理助手，幫助你保持積極向上，避免消極情緒。JOI是一款以簡單有趣的方式記錄心情日記的完美工具。觀察你的心情和一天中的活動之間的關聯，看看你生活中的模式。
localize.tagline: 口袋裏的自理助手，讓你更快樂。
